Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map class implant a class to manege the game's map it contains 8 rows and 8 columns rows are shown with 1,2,3,.. columns are shown with A,B,C,...
    Since:
    3/31/2020

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map()
      Instantiates a new Map 4 cells are filled at start of the game .
